result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Rodney Kenneth Lewis

records.addlTxt:
Defendant Rodney Kenneth Lewis appeared by video, in custody.  Attorney Connor Romenesko appeared by video for Rodney Kenneth Lewis.  Attorney Thomas Hasle in court for State of Wisconsin. 
Case set for a Preliminary Hearing. Preliminary hearing proceeded. Sworn for the State: Wauwatosa Officer M. Keck. State rests. Defense rests. Defense motion to dismiss argued and denied. Court found probable cause and bound defendant over for trial. Original information received and filed; defendant given a copy, waived reading, was arraigned in open court and plead not guilty. Case is adjourned to Branch 40. Scheduling conference scheduled for November 8, 2022 at 01:30 pm.

Defendant Rodney Kenneth Lewis appeared by video, in custody.  Attorney Connor Romenesko appeared by video for Rodney Kenneth Lewis.  Prosecuting attorney Thomas Hasle in court for the State of Wisconsin. 
Case set for status of counsel. Attorney Romenesko has been appointed. Court ordered case adjourned for a Preliminary Hearing in Preliminary Hearing Court, Room 146 of the Criminal Justice Facility.
Preliminary hearing scheduled for October 26, 2022 at 02:30 pm.

Defendant Rodney Kenneth Lewis not in court.  Attorney Patrick O'Keefe in court for State of Wisconsin. 
CASE HELD OFF THE RECORD PER JUDGE. Case in court for status conference.  Counsel has not yet been appointed for the defendant.  Status of counsel previously scheduled in Branch PE for 10-03-2022 at 2:30 pm.  Case adjourned to Branch PE.
Court set a status hearing upon receipt of the letter filed by the State Public Defender's Office on 8-31-2022. Parties notified of date.  Status hearing scheduled for September 20, 2022 at 08:30 am.

Defendant Rodney Kenneth Lewis appeared by phone, in custody in Fox Lake Correctional.  Prosecuting attorney Nate Kristian McClure appeared by video for the State of Wisconsin. 
Case is set for a Preliminary Hearing. SPD has not appointed counsel. Case is adjourned. Court orders case adjourned for CAUSE for a Status of Counsel.
Status conference scheduled for October 3, 2022 at 02:30 pm.
Received and Filed:  No Conflict Information Letter from OSPD.

Court ordered defendant TURNED OVER TO Justice Point for Level 5 Supervision with Electronic Monitoring. 24/7 hour curfew with the exception of verified employment, medical and legal appointments. No possession of dangerous weapons or firearms.

Defendant Rodney Kenneth Lewis appeared by video, in custody at Fox Lake Correctional.  Attorney Fred Richardson III appeared by video for Rodney Kenneth Lewis.  Attorney Karine O'Byrne appeared by video for the State of Wisconsin. Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge Shelton, Branch 40. Defendant given a copy of the complaint and advised of maximum penalties, right to counsel and right to a preliminary hearing.  Court reviewed the complaint and found probable cause to hold the defendant for further proceedings.  DEFENDANT IS INDIGENT AND PUBLIC DEFENDER WILL PROVIDE COUNSEL.This hearing will be streamed live on Dacast:  https://iframe.dacast.com/live/4dafbf46-ed15-c11c-fa22-a58262833632/99073afd-37c2-acfa-830d-b1ddcaebf0ea
Preliminary hearing scheduled for September 1, 2022 at 02:30 pm.

Court ordered no contact with All Mobil gas stations in Milwaukee County, and all their employees
No Contact/No Weapons Order, signed and filed.
Initial appearance scheduled via Zoom. Defendant is in custody at Fox Lake Correctional.  Defendant did not appear.  Intake Coordinator will reschedule.
